name: Ancient Ruby Dragon
resistance: bludgeoning, slashing, and piercing from nonmagical attacks
senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 28

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Amplification Aura
traits.desc: Allies’ spells cast within 30 feet have their saving throw DC increased by 4.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit; reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

legendary.name: Detect
legendary.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) Check.

legendary.name: Psionics
legendary.desc: The dragon uses a psionic ability.

legendary.name: Psionic Shift (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.desc: The dragon releases a wave of telekinetic energy from its mind. Every creature within 15 feet must make a DC 24 Intelligence saving throw or take 15 (2d6 + 8) force damage and be knocked prone. The dragon then can move up to half its movement speed.
